column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Here in Chicago on a quick trip from LA. Saw this on our bus tour on the weekend
column2: came following morning that happened to be opening day. Loved it. Came the next two mornings as well. We had the Berry Bliss pancakes
column6: pot roast Benedict. Our 18mo old had eggs & side of berries two days & a PB&J the other.  All were very good. The winners were the Los Altos Benedict & Berry Bliss pancakes.  Tons of flavor! The staff was extremely friendly and attentive. it seemed to get busier each morning and they were great. We wish them well & hope to see them in LA soon!
